item.title: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul endorses Zohran Mamdani for NYC mayor
item.description: Democratic Gov. Kathy Hochul has urged New Yorkers to vote Zohran Mamdani for mayor of New York City, giving the Democratic nominee one of his most significant endorsements to date in the contest to lead the nationâ€™s biggest city.

item.title: Community honors life of 10-year-old Harper Moyski, killed in shooting at Minneapolis church
